reviews.review_msg: Depends a great deal on the credibility of the TA for this course (their comments, at times, contradict). Not well-structured timewise for assignments (no breathing space). Excessive (& not well correlated) reading & heavy power-point use. Head's up, he will prescribed his POV for you to do well. Would have liked to seen Baker teach it.
Imran Munir= excellence! Great TA and awesome prof! If you want a TA/Prof who is helpful and a good marker- take his class

I really liked the assignments he gave. I've heard stories about him before (basically that he's arrogant) and I think that he somewhat realized that he's not the most amazing being in the world, but still holds a sense of cockiness. PLEASE Brad if you're reading this, stop chewing gum when lecturing it's gross.

What should I say, this prof just rocks. His lectures are very interesting and through all the semester, you only write one huge essay and group assignment. (no mid, no final) However, becasue of that, a lot of students had never attended his interesting lectures. so tragic. Just take this course. GPA booster plus hot professor's interesting lectur

Brad is not an unfair marker, as some of the earlier comments state. He is pretty clear about what he wants from the students, you just have to ask him more questions if you don't understand. As a TA, he demands more from his students and we were required to do more work than other tutorials, but at least we were actually learning something.
He was horrible, I never disliked a professor so much.  The lectures were like watching paint dry and the final was so specific that it was just stupid.

Jody is an excellent lecturer, really passionate and great at getting students to think critically. Although you don't need to attend lectures, I really enjoyed them and I found his classes really interesting and thought provoking. He and the TAs I had were very understanding and super helpful when it came to assignments.

You definitely don't need to attend CMNS323W with him to pass, but I highly recommend attending because his lectures are so interesting! You don't even need to take notes, just sit back and listen. You won't regret it. The term paper is time-consuming, but he gives lots of advice and ideas to get you started. Take a class with him at some point!!!

This class was a bit tough as you have to get creative for the group project. But Jody is, as always, accessible in his office and is willing to help anytime. Paper was standard 10-12 pages and it's broken down into sections with different due dates, so that really helped. Pretty solid class but lectures could be a tad boring, just do the readings

Don't take this class with Jody. His lectures drag on, he jumps all over the place with topics. DOES NOT give you clear criteria on assignments... You can end up getting a bad mark just because he doesn't make a clear criteria of what you need to do.

Easy class but I wish his lectures were most structured and interesting. All he did is repeat things from 223, have random rants and rambles. Structure of the course is good, lecture was pointless and boring.

Jody is an amazing prof. I took this class specifically because I had heard he made things really interesting and he did not disappoint. All of the readings were online and there was no need to buy the textbook. The majority of the marking was done by the TA.
